archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.2.6b: b) scenarios where multiple business environments are compromised simultaneously, including operational and IT infrastructure, services and environments (e.g. by a ransomware or nation state attack)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
